ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the Request Resolution field they must complete prior to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Request_Resolution__c), ISPICKVAL( Status ,'NS_Closed'), RecordType.Name='NS Internal', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Parent.Status,'NS_Closed')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Request Resolution prior to closing the Case.
